subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Families and Family Life
Athletics and Sports
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Top athletes tend to have older siblings, research shows, and that is true of 17 of the 23 players on the United States roster, many of whom showed a competitive drive from an early age.
snippet: Top athletes tend to have older siblings, research shows, and that is true of 17 of the 23 players on the United States roster, many of whom showed a competitive drive from an early age.
